content: retro style toilet roll covers with a modern twist bright and colourful cacti designed to fit standard toilet roll only this cacti can also be used as a perfect gag gift for the person and we all know at least one who stocked up on toilet rolls when they were in short supply can also be stuffed and the base gathered to make a toy intermediate level 3 page pattern this pattern is my original pattern by purchasing this pattern you agree to the terms of use please do not claim this pattern as your own you may not sell or distribute the pattern or any part thereof without prior permission it is for personal use only it is permitted to make items from this pattern to sell for charitable purposes provided they meet safety guidelines and crochet at teri s is accredited
